# priceIncreaseStatus

**Type**

The status that indicates whether an auto-renewable subscription is subject to a price increase.

## Declaration

```swift
int32 priceIncreaseStatus
```

## Discussion

For more information about managing prices, see [https://developer.apple.com/app-store/subscriptions/#managing-prices-for-existing-subscribers] and [https://help.apple.com/app-store-connect/#/devc9870599e].
title: priceIncreaseStatus
